name: Brothers Battle
description:
You and your brother fight those enemies who are trying to attack that island

Your first attempt with the "Super Cannon" succeeded, but there are still a lot of them on the other islands. You have to get rid of them before the Greatest Unknown Event that is expected to come soon, but now you have to finish off these enemies because they are just slaves to the owners of the worst event! Otherwise, they will be a hindrance to you! But! Don't worry, you and your brother together can get this done quickl

- Brothers Battle

It is the new part of a series

- Cuby World Story Bundle

It is one of the currently completed series games

- Magic World Challenges (Under development)

- Super Cannon
